name: Famous African Americans - Set 2
description:
This is the second of two FREEWARE games to learn and study the names, biography and faces of 19 African Americans from the early history of the United States. There are two study screens where you can review the biographical information and another screen which allows you to see a photo of each individual. Then there are two game screens. In one games you match the name of the individual with the correct photograph. In the other game, you match the name of the individual with a biographical fact. There is a button which reveals the answer if the player is stumped. At the end of the game, there is a report screen. A report is given only if a game is completed. The report screen show the number of right answers, wrong answers, number of hints used and the final score. The player may restart the game or go back and try to improve a score.

This game is totally free meaning there are no strings attached. There is no registration, no advertising, no online connections, and no collection of any data whatsoever. This game may be installed on as many devices as you like. It will run on Android versions 5.0 through 10.0. It has been played on a smartphone, 10" tablet, 6" tablet, Android TV and an Android Smart Board. This app requires no permissions on installment and can be played without internet or WiFi access.
Contact rtcarman47@gmail.com with comments and suggestions. For other free Android games go to your favorite source and search for Richard Carman or rtcgames. Thanks and enjoy.
